backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling rooms, messages, moderation actions, user profiles, bans, and access control with counters and retention limits.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new state types and a simple migration function that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing frontend files, components, and test IDs associated with admin password alignment and adminâ€‘capability UX changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing hooks, pages, components, and utilities used throughout the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, initializes profile and area hooks, and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModer: Admin panels for room deletion, message deletion, and user banning, gated by admin capability and using related backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: UI component that prompts for an admin password and triggers an unlock callback, showing errors and handling submission state.
frontend/src/components/chat/InRoomAdmin: Empty placeholder file for in-room admin controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: Provides a dropdown menu for message-level actions like mute, block, report, and admin delete, including dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Handles composing and sending chat messages with auth/profile checks, error handling, and login prompts.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders a scrollable list of chat messages with moderation filtering and per-message action menus.
Defines the main application layout with header, content area, and bottom navigation tied to router state.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomAction: Empty placeholder file for room-level actions menu.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDelete: Dialog for deleting a room that validates an admin password and triggers a backend delete mutation.
frontend/src/config/adminPassword.ts: Exports the shared UI admin password used for unlocking admin controls.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Provides centroid coordinates for Indian states and union territories for in-memory geographic calculations.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Defines an interface and a constant list of all Indian states and union territories with stable IDs and labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages authenticated and anonymous user profiles, including fetching, auto-creating, and updating backend profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Handles admin access flow with password unlock and displays moderation tools and capability status.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Loads and displays room messages with a header and composer, handling navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides login UI and redirects after authentication, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows rooms filtered by area and search, and manages room creation with authentication and validation checks.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for area selection, location access, profile editing, auth controls, and admin unlock.
Generates, loads, and saves anonymous user profiles with random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Loads and saves selected geographic area info in localStorage and exposes a list of all areas including Indian states.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Detects auth-related errors, extracts user-friendly messages, and appends login guidance when appropriate.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores, retrieves, and clears post-login redirect paths using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the nearest Indian state to given coordinates using Haversine distance and predefined centroids.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash/query parameter cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/validation/principalT: Validates and parses Principal IDs from user text input, returning structured success or error results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, current feature state, and requirements related to password-based admin privileges.
